body:
Hey guys! You guys may know me as Oraporo, but I'm now changeling my username to Rusha_! 
Ive decided to no longer be a mid field and work on my kd (6.8 kd) but to now join some of the rushers in destroying the monuments.
hope I can fit in well with many of the great, skilled rushers in the game! cya guys in game

title: Just wanna let you know

replies.body: Not to be rude but this seems rather spammy.
